data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Francisco Molineros-Hurtado, Robert Tulio González Mina, Nicola S. Flanagan, Tupac Otero (2014): VANILLA RIVASII (ORCHIDACEAE), A NEW SPECIES FROM THE COLOMBIAN PACIFIC REGION. LANKESTERIANA 13 (3): 352-358, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.344790, URL: http://www.redalyc.org/pdf/443/44339826013.pdf|1 occurrence
